author: Reuters
title: Hackers shut down system for booking COVID-19 shots in Italy's Lazio region - Reuters
description: Hackers have attacked and shut down the IT systems of the company that manages COVID-19 vaccination appointments for the Lazio region surrounding Rome, the regional government said on Sunday.
